page.title: 08A TWELVE-YEAR-OLD'S DAY
page.content: My name is Karen Rynston.I am 12years old.My mother,father,brother and I live at Hall Place, off North Road.My father is self-employed.My mother works in our home.My mother works in our home.My 4year-old brother goes to Nursery School.Each day we eat breakfast together.At 8.40 I goto school.My mother takes me in the car.I am in Year4.I have been Captain of Nelson House this year.There are three other Houses:Raleigh,Drake & Hawkins. Nelson House won the School sport Cup & the House shield this year.Year4 have been to many Museums & Theatres. I enjoyed the visit to Shakespeare's "Twelfth Night" very much.I thought Malvolio's yellow stocking were very funny.I have liked all the lessons in the 4thYear.I think they will prepare me for the Secondary School.I am quite looking forward to my new school.
